languages.text: {n}Вам приходилось слышать о подобных периодах нестабильности варпа. В том числе о моментах, когда Зев на годы становился полностью недоступным для навигации, временно отрезая {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} от Империума. Тем не менее, слова Владайма звучат особенно тревожно — похоже, {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}что-то{/g} сильно повлияло на Зев.{/n}

{n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам приходилось слышать о подобных периодах нестабильности варпа. В том числе о моментах, когда Зев на годы становился полностью недоступным для навигации, временно отрезая {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} от Империума. Тем не менее, слова Владайма звучат особенно тревожно — похоже, {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}что-то{/g} сильно повлияло на Зев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

{n}You've heard about such intervals of warp instability. Including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the Koronus Expanse from the Imperium.{/n}

{n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

{n}You've heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium.{/n}

{n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

{n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

languages.text: {n}歪みが不安定になる期間の話を聞いたことがある。その最中は、マウへと何年も全く航行できなくなり、一時的に帝国から{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}が遮断されるケースもある。それでも、ヴラダイムの言葉は特に考慮すべきものだ。{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}何か{/g}がマウに大きな影響を及ぼしているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}歪みが不安定になる期間の話を聞いたことがある。その最中は、マウへと何年も全く航行できなくなり、一時的に帝国から{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}が遮断されるケースもある。それでも、ヴラダイムの言葉は特に考慮すべきものだ。{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}何か{/g}がマウに大きな影響を及ぼしているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你早已听说过，亚空间之前也发生过很多次不稳定的情况。那段期间，包括巨口在内的多条航道完全无法航行，持续数年之久，{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}与帝国之间的联系也会暂时中断。但即便如此，弗拉迪姆的话还是让你忧心忡忡，似乎{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}某些东西{/g}对巨口产生了巨大影响。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你早已听说过，亚空间之前也发生过很多次不稳定的情况。那段期间，包括巨口在内的多条航道完全无法航行，持续数年之久，{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}与帝国之间的联系也会暂时中断。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eres consciente de que existen periodos de inestabilidad en la disformidad. Te vienen a la mente casos en los que era imposible navegar por las Fauces durante años y años, por lo que la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} quedaba temporalmente aislada del Imperium. Sin embargo, las palabras de Vladaym son especialmente alarmantes. Parece que {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}algo{/g} ha afectado gravemente a las Fauces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eres consciente de que existen periodos de inestabilidad en la disformidad. Te vienen a la mente casos en los que era imposible navegar por las Fauces durante años y años, por lo que la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} quedaba temporalmente aislada del Imperium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous savez que le Warp connaît des périodes d'instabilité qui rendent parfois la Gueule inaccessible pendant des années, empêchant toute navigation entre les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et l'Imperium. Pour autant, les allégations de Vladaym n'en sont pas moins alarmantes : il semble que {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}quelque chose{/g} ait profondément altéré la Gueule.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous savez que le Warp connaît des périodes d'instabilité qui rendent parfois la Gueule inaccessible pendant plusieurs années, empêchant toute navigation entre les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et l'Imperium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast schon von Perioden der Warp-Instabilität gehört, und dass der Schlund jahrelang komplett unzugänglich war, wodurch die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} vorübergehend vom Imperium abgeschnitten war. Trotzdem sind Vladayms Worte ausgesprochen alarmierend ... wie es scheint, hat {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}etwas{/g} nachhaltigen Einfluss auf den Schlund.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast schon von Perioden der Warp-Instabilität gehört, und dass der Schlund jahrelang komplett unzugänglich war, wodurch die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} vorübergehend vom Imperium abgeschnitten war.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ağız'ın yıllarca seyre izin vermediği ve bu yüzden {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ni{/g} İmparatorluk'tan geçici olarak ayırdığı durumların da yaşandığı öteboyut dengesizliği dönemlerini duymuştun. Öyle bile olsa Vladaym'ın sözleri ayrıca endişe verici. {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}Bir şey{/g}, Ağız'ı derinden etkilemiş gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of periods of warp instability, including cases where the Maw would become completely inaccessible for navigation for years on end, thus temporarily cutting off the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from the Imperium. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ağız'ın yıllarca seyre izin vermediği ve böylelikle {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ni İmparatorluk'tan geçici olarak ayırdığı durumların da yaşandığı öteboyut dengesizliği dönemlerini duymuştun. Öyle bile olsa Vladaym'ın sözleri ayrıca endişe verici. {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}Bir şey{/g}, Ağız'ı derinden etkilemiş gibi.{/n}
